data.title: Jerry Roberts Obituary
authors: Folk Funeral Home, Inc. and Crematory
data.meta_description: Obituary for Jerry Roberts | Graveside Service for Jerry Ray Roberts, 68, of Williston, SC will be held at eleven o’clock a.m., Friday, September 3, 2021 in the Williston Cemetery with the Reverend Charles Morris...
data.meta_site_name: Jerry Roberts Obituary | August 23, 2021 | Williston, SC
data.text:
Graveside Service for Jerry Ray Roberts, 68, of Williston, SC will be held at eleven o’clock a.m., Friday, September 3, 2021 in the Williston Cemetery with the Reverend Charles Morris officiating, Masonic Rites will be accorded. Jerry passed away on Monday, August 23, 2021..

Born in Jackson County, AL, he was a son of the late Jessie Roberts and Eva Mae Sargent Roberts. He retired from SRS where he was a member of the Sheet Metal Local Union # 399 and was a member of the Hope Masonic Lodge # 126. Jerry loved to fish and enjoyed spending time with his family and grandbabies. He was a Tennessee Volunteers Fan and loved tinkering and fixing things.

Survivors include his loving wife of 37 years Ruby Marlene Pendergrass Roberts of the home; his daughters Patricia (Bobby) Smith of Lavergne, TN; Emily (Greg) Jackson of Sherwood, TN; a son Jeremy (Erin) Roberts of Warrenville; grandchildren Caleb Smith, Hailey Smith, Marissa (Joseph) Murphy, Morgan Jackson, and Kyra Roberts; one grandson on the way; one great grandson on the way; sisters Lori Ann (Wesley) Phillips of Hollywood, AL, and Wanda (R.C.) Wann of Stevenson, AL; a brother Dwain Roberts of Hollywood, AL; sisters-in-law Louise Pendergrass and Crystal Pendergrass; his fur baby Gracie; along with a number of nieces and nephews.
